title: DosTrece
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Introduced a separate vegan menu in 2014 which includes an arugula salad, a taboule white quinoa, Albondigas raw in two sauces, wheat tagliatelle with vegetables, tropical risotto with coconut milk and strawberries, vegan burger with crispy potato, and for dessert a raw apple pie.
